value:
Unlike their weapons and tomes, the
clothing of the 12 crusaders was lost
to time... This is merely a costume.

The legend of the crusaders and the
power within their blood are far more
than mere legends of the past.

A festival to honor the 12 crusaders
chosen by the gods, and to convey
their deeds to their descendants...$k$pOh, to know what they would say
if they could see all this!

Hmm... Perhaps I should dedicate a
piece to my ancestor. This calls for
notes that can soar through the sky...

Those descended from the crusaders
will likely lead their countries, serving
as guiding lights for their people...

I am Lewyn, a friend of
$Nf.$k$pI hope that we can become close
as well.

Anyone tactless enough to ruin the
festivities should be blown away by
the wind!

Behold, the skill of one who has
mastered the power of the wind
itself!
Cloudy days are another part of life.

Worry not. I already know exactly
how best to use this.

The name's Lewyn. Since I'm a
bard, I was asked to sing at this
festival. Care to hear a tune or two?

Are you enjoying yourself? Oh, come
now! No need for that face—festivals
are meant to be enjoyed, after all.$k$pDuring the war, I wandered the land.
Scraps of food, drops of water... I saw
people fight bitterly over such things.$k$pBut the nobles...they spent all their
time vying for power as nothing more
than a game—a pointless sport.$k$pPower is necessary, and war is
inevitable. But...why? What drives
a person to fight?$k$pThat question threads throughout
the song I wrote for this festival.$k$pIf we could answer that question,
perhaps the power of the Brands
would never again be used for war...$k$p...I can sing it for you now, if you
would like to hear it.
たあっ
How's this?
くっ
Pretty good...
Wind, guide me!
Shall we end this?
Think you've a chance?
Since it's a festival...
Fun while it lasted...
Haha...
I've adorned myself in the manner of the crusader Ced... What do you think? Appropriate?
Ah! Now, I know this is a festival, but do try not to get carried away...
The hearts of those who pursue salvation beat as one, now and always...
If you have any questions about the 12 crusaders, I can answer them.
One moment of happiness at a festival can last a lifetime.
Even now, the world shifts beneath our feet...
I am wind...wind that comes before the light's warmth.
Right, right.
Hmm...
Leave it to me.
